nodes.text: The Bleeder Spice Flow was the name given to an industrial section of the Red Light Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The area was used by the Bleeder gangs to process and distribute their spice.
The Bleeder Spice Flow appears as part of the Red Light Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
